bill.title: AFTER Act of 2021 Animal Freedom from Testing, Experiments, and Research Act of 2021
bill.description: To amend the Animal Welfare Act to allow for the adoption or non-laboratory placement of certain animals used in Federal research, and for other purposes.

committee.name: Subcommittee on Livestock and Foreign Agriculture
